mapper.insert: insert rank, title, rank_date into movie values (#{rank},#{title},#{rankDate})
mapper.update: update set title = #{title} from movie where movie_seq like #{movieSeq}
mapper.delete: delete from movie where movie_seq like #{movieSeq}
mapper.select: select movie_seq movieSeq, rank, title, rank_date rankDate from movie where movie_seq = '${searchWord}' /* parameter가 String이여서 value로 변경 {movieSeq} */
